key.name: brightness
key.description: Set the brightness factor - 1.0 for no reduction to 0.1 for very dark background windows.

key.name: saturation
key.description: Set the saturation factor - 1.0 for no reduction to 0.0 for full grayscale.

key.name: brightness-night-light-override
key.summary: Use a different brightness factor when night light mode is enabled
key.description: This determines if the brightness factor for night light is used or not.

key.name: brightness-night-light
key.description: Set the brightness factor when the display night light is enabled - 1.0 for no reduction to 0.1 for very dark background windows.

key.name: saturation-night-light-override
key.summary: Use a different saturation factor when night light mode is enabled
key.description: This determines if the saturation factor for night light is used or not.

key.name: saturation-night-light
key.description: Set the saturation factor when the display night light is enabled - 1.0 for no reduction to 0.0 for full grayscale.

key.name: brightness-dark-style-override
key.summary: Use a different brightness factor when dark style appearance is enabled
key.description: This determines if the brightness factor for dark style appearance is used or not.

key.name: brightness-dark-style
key.description: Set the brightness factor when dark style appearance is enabled - 1.0 for no reduction to 0.1 for very dark background windows.

key.name: saturation-dark-style-override
key.summary: Use a different saturation factor when dark style appearance is enabled
key.description: This determines if the saturation factor for dark style appearance is used or not.

key.name: saturation-dark-style
key.description: Set the saturation factor when dark style appearance is enabled - 1.0 for no reduction to 0.0 for full grayscale.

key.name: toggle-shortcut
key.description: Shortcut key to toggle the background windows dimming on or off.

key.name: dimming-enabled
key.description: Control if the dimming effect is on or off while the extension is enabled. Used with the shortcut key above.

key.name: target-monitor
key.summary: Defines on which monitor(s) the dimming effect is enabled
key.description: Control if the dimming effect is applied only to the primary monitor, only to the secondary monitor(s) or to all monitors.

key.name: dim-always-on-top
key.summary: Allowing dimming of windows marked as always on top
key.description: Control if the dimming effect is on or off for windows marked as always on top.

key.name: dim-maximized
key.description: Control if the dimming effect is on or off for maximized windows.

key.name: dim-tiled
key.description: Control if the dimming effect is on or off for tiled windows.
